extracted_text:
On August 22, 2025, Trent Ltd began a series of meetings with analysts and institutional investors . These were informational meetings conducted in compliance with SEBI regulations, and no unpublished, price-sensitive information was to be disclosed.

Scheduled participants for subsequent meetings includedAmansa Capital, ICICI Securities, and UBS . The schedule was noted to be subject to change.
